Item.Name: Name
Item.Desc: Unique name of the control.

Item.Name: X
Item.Desc: X position of the control.

Item.Name: Y
Item.Desc: Y position of the control.

Item.Name: Width
Item.Desc: Width of the control.

Item.Name: Height
Item.Desc: Height of the control.

Item.Name: Text
Item.Desc: The text of the control.

Item.Name: ToolTip
Item.Desc: The new tooltip text. Maximum allowed ToolTip is 80 characters.

Item.Name: TextColor:Normal
Item.Desc: The normal state text color of button control.

Item.Name: TextColor:Disbaled
Item.Desc: The disabled state text color of button control.

Item.Name: TextColor:Hover
Item.Desc: The hover state text color of button control.

Item.Name: TextColor:Down
Item.Desc: The down (pressed) state text color of button control.

Item.Name: TopColor:Normal
Item.Desc: The normal state top background color of button control.

Item.Name: TopColor:Disbaled
Item.Desc: The disabled state top background color of button control.

Item.Name: TopColor:Hover
Item.Desc: The hover state top background color of button control.

Item.Name: TopColor:Down
Item.Desc: The down (pressed) state top background color of button control.

Item.Name: BottomColor:Normal
Item.Desc: The normal state bottom background color of button control.

Item.Name: BottomColor:Disbaled
Item.Desc: The disabled state bottom background color of button control.

Item.Name: BottomColor:Hover
Item.Desc: The hover state bottom background color of button control.

Item.Name: BottomColor:Down
Item.Desc: The down (pressed) state bottom background color of button control.

Item.Name: ShineColor:Normal
Item.Desc: The normal state shine color of button control.

Item.Name: ShineColor:Disbaled
Item.Desc: The disabled state shine color of button control.

Item.Name: ShineColor:Hover
Item.Desc: The hover state shine color of button control.

Item.Name: ShineColor:Down
Item.Desc: The down (pressed) state shine color of button control.

Item.Name: VerticalAlign
Item.Desc: The vertical alignment of the button text.

Item.Name: Top
Item.Desc: Aligned to the top.

Item.Name: Center
Item.Desc: Aligned to the vertical center.

Item.Name: Bottom
Item.Desc: Aligned to the bottom.

Item.Name: HorizontalAlign
Item.Desc: The horizontal alignment of the button text.

Item.Name: Left
Item.Desc: Aligned to the left.

Item.Name: Center
Item.Desc: Aligned to the horizontal center.

Item.Name: Right
Item.Desc: Aligned to the right.

Item.Name: Enabled
Item.Desc: Allow user interaction.

Item.Name: true
Item.Desc: Enable specified control.

Item.Name: false
Item.Desc: Disable specified control.

Item.Name: Visible
Item.Desc: Visibility of the control.

Item.Name: true
Item.Desc: Set control as visible.

Item.Name: false
Item.Desc: Set control as invisible.

Item.Name: TabStop
Item.Desc: Specifies that the user can move to this control with the TAB key.

Item.Name: true
Item.Desc: User can move to this control with the TAB key.

Item.Name: false
Item.Desc: User can not move to this control with the TAB key.

Item.Name: FontUsage
Item.Desc: The usage type of font.

Item.Name: Use System Font
Item.Desc: Use default system font.

Item.Name: Custom Font
Item.Desc: Use a custom font.

Item.Note: In a unicode application using default system font is highly recomended.

Item.Name: Font
Item.Desc: Specifies the font for the control.
Item.Note: In a unicode application using default system font is highly recomended.
